channel.title: Adding old KBD? Repp ++
channel.description: Okay, Hey guys I'm using an old source and client and when I was adding KBD in I saw its a cow with like 3 other NPC's mixed in? How do i change it back to the old KBD? I'm not sure if its client sided or server sided so please don't flame.
